description: Roxbury Public Works Yard Surplus Paint, Used Motor Oil, and Yard Waste Drop-off Site
materials: Brush; Grass Clippings; Leaves; Paint Donation; Latex Paint; Swap Shop; Used Motor Oil; Weeds
notes: This program is open to the residents of Boston and proof of residency is required.  Paint may be taken from the Swap Shop for free.  Paint and motor oil are not accepted from commercial businesses.  There is a limit of 20 containers per visit.  Paint must be in original containers that are not open or leaking, with legible labels.  Please do not mix paints.   Evaporated or empty cans will NOT be accepted. Yard waste is accepted in paper leaf bags only.  Please call for more information.
